title: How to Make Coriander and Hazelnut Pesto

steps.headline: Chop the coriander and parsley finely.
Place the crushed hazelnuts in a bowl.
steps.description: Add the chopped coriander and parsley.

steps.headline: Add the Parmesan cheese (if using), lemon zest and both oils.
Season to taste with salt, pepper and lemon juice.
Serve.
steps.description: Use on pasta, as a dip for tempura veggies and seafood, on fish, on seafood and on steamed vegetables.

text: Chop the coriander and parsley finely.  Place the crushed hazelnuts in a bowl. Add the chopped coriander and parsley. Stir a little.  Add the Parmesan cheese (if using), lemon zest and both oils. Mix together well. Season to taste with salt, pepper and lemon juice.  Serve. Use on pasta, as a dip for tempura veggies and seafood, on fish, on seafood and on steamed vegetables. Finished.
